title: Build error - CUDA path containing backslash
body_html:
Hello,

Having issues while building pytorch.
CUDA path is constructed or changed to have backslash but has an added "\include".

C:/Program Files/NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDA/v8.0\include

Environment: Win 10, Cuda 8, CUDDN 7.1, Py 2.7, cmake 3.12, VS 2017.

ERROR:

CustomBuild:
Building NVCC (Device) object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/__/aten/src/THC/Release/caffe2_gpu_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.obj
CMake Warning (dev) at caffe2_gpu_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.obj.Release.cmake:82 (set):
Syntax error in cmake code at

  C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/build/caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/__/aten/src/THC/caffe2_gpu_generated_THCReduceApplyUtils.cu.obj.Release.cmake:82

when parsing string

C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/third_party/protobuf/src;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/cmake/../third_party/eigen;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/cmake/../third_party/pybind11/in

en/src/TH;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src/TH;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src/THC;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/build/caffe2/aten/src/THC;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/
build/caffe2/aten/src/THC;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src/THC;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src/THCUNN;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src/ATen/cuda;C:/PY/Proj
ects/pytorch/build/caffe2/aten/src/TH;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src/TH;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src/TH;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/build/caffe2/aten/src/
TH;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/build/caffe2/aten/src;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/build/aten/src;C:/PY/Projects/pytorch/aten/src/THN

Hello,

Having issues while building pytorch.
CUDA path is constructed or changed to have backslash but has an added "\include".

C:/Program Files/NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDA/v8.0\include
